page.title: 20Morganite Crucible, Norton
page.content: Across a field, adjacent to the works, there lies Norton Hall now under restoration. This was purchased along with the factory but was later sold. Morganite is a Private Limited Company which imports all its Granite from Madagasca. It is then processed by the central manufacturing building. By the side of this building there are warehouses, an executive building, a canteen and recreation areas for the workers. Morganite Crucible is not a noisy, polluting industrial site, despite the huge chimney. It provides valuable employment locally and helps to maintain the polulation in a rural area where most jobs are in agriculture and where people are leaving the land.
